name: REQUIEM (Jacob Morbeck)
description:
Requiem is a two person 2D puzzle platformer game in which you and a friend take control of two characters of a race that has nearly been driven to extinction due to the recent collapse of their world. These characters navigate a puzzle and trap filled environment to fight back against the darkness.

    This game is a semester 1 final project from a Bachelor of Creative Technologies, or Game Art, course at Media Design School.

Features:

  • Two player action, grab a friend!

  • Carry and jump off of each other

  • Traps and puzzles

  • Death is not permanent -Defeat your friend’s shade to bring them back into the light

  • Two types of enemies

  • 4 levels
